 2018-03802018-03-29PCH,  ,  ,  , 
ActBroadcasting Act
PrecisAppointment of SANDRA B. SINGH of Burnaby, British Columbia, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, in the place of Maureen McCaw, whose term has expired.
